patch 8.2.1428: Vim9: :def function does not abort on nested function error

Problem:    Vim9: :def function does not abort on nested function error.
Solution:   Check whether an error message was given. (closes #6691)

patch 8.2.1427: Vim9: cannot use a range with marks in :def function

Problem:    Vim9: cannot use a range with marks in :def function.
Solution:   Parse range after colon. (closes #6686)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1427: Vim9: cannot use a range with marks in :def function · vim/vim@7c5ad34
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1427: Vim9: cannot use a range with marks in :def function · vim/vim@7c5ad34
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot use a range with marks in :def function. Solution: Parse range after colon. (closes #6686)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a177344dc0c337e5b272c1c59d13964a8318bcfa|patch 8.2.1426: Vim9: cannot call autoload function in :def function>
patch 8.2.1426: Vim9: cannot call autoload function in :def function

Problem:    Vim9: cannot call autoload function in :def function.
Solution:   Load the autoload script. (closes #6690)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1426: Vim9: cannot call autoload function in :def function · vim/vim@a177344
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1426: Vim9: cannot call autoload function in :def function · vim/vim@a177344
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot call autoload function in :def function. Solution: Load the autoload script. (closes #6690)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/575f24b3f3d8cd8bfc2da402c2938c0c7ace7877|patch 8.2.1425: Vim9: cannot use call() without :call>
patch 8.2.1425: Vim9: cannot use call() without :call

Problem:    Vim9: cannot use call() without :call.
Solution:   Do not skip over "call(". (closes #6689)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1425: Vim9: cannot use call() without :call · vim/vim@575f24b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1425: Vim9: cannot use call() without :call · vim/vim@575f24b
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot use call() without :call. Solution: Do not skip over "call(". (closes #6689)

patch 8.2.1424: Mac build fails

Problem:    Mac build fails.
Solution:   Adjust configure to not fall back to Athena.  Adjust some other
            files.

patch 8.2.1423: Vim9: find global function when looking for script-local

Problem:    Vim9: find global function when looking for script-local.
Solution:   Don't strip prefix if name starts with "s:". (closes #6688)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1423: Vim9: find global function when looking for script-local · vim/vim@035d6e9
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: find global function when looking for script-local. Solution: Don't strip prefix if name starts with "s:". (closes #6688)

patch 8.2.1422: the Mac GUI implementation is outdated

Problem:    The Mac GUI implementation is outdated and probably doesn't even
            work.
Solution:   Remove the Mac GUI code.  The MacVim project provides the
            supported Vim GUI version.

patch 8.2.1421: Vim9: handling "+" and "-" before number differs from script

Problem:    Vim9: handling "+" and "-" before number differs from Vim script.
Solution:   Use the same sequence of commands.
